body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:v1="http://xmldefs.volkswagenag.com/Retail/WorkshopOrderStagingService/V1" xmlns:v3="http://xmldefs.volkswagenag.com/DD/WorkshopOrder/V3" xmlns:v11="http://xmldefs.volkswagenag.com/DD/WorkshopOrder/Ref/V1" xmlns:v12="http://xmldefs.volkswagenag.com/DD/BusinessPartner/Ref/V1" xmlns:v13="http://xmldefs.volkswagenag.com/DD/Vehicle/Ref/V1" xmlns:v14="http://xmldefs.volkswagenag.com/DD/SparePart/Ref/V1">
   <soapenv:Header xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">
        <wsa:Action xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">http://xmldefs.volkswagenag.com/Retail/WorkshopOrderStagingService/V1/WorkshopOrderStagingServicePortType/AssignWorkshopOrder</wsa:Action>
        <wsa:MessageID xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">urn:uuid:4f34e395-3b52-4ce0-91f1-e532784084f5</wsa:MessageID>        
    </soapenv:Header>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <v1:AssignWorkshopOrder>
         <v3:WorkshopOrder>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <v3:WorkshopOrderIdentifier>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v11:WorkshopOrderUID>{{workshopOrderUID}}</v11:WorkshopOrderUID>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v11:Dealer>
                  <v12:DealerRef>
                     <v12:DealerIdentifier>
                        <!--Optional:-->
                        <v12:PartnerKey>
                           <!--Optional:-->
                           <v12:Country listID="A" listVersionID="2" name="abc" languageID="DEU">DEU</v12:Country>
                           <!--Optional:-->
                           <v12:Brand listID="A" listVersionID="2" name="abc" languageID="DEU">V</v12:Brand>
                           <!--Optional:-->
                           <v12:PartnerNumber>{{partnerNumber}}</v12:PartnerNumber>
                        </v12:PartnerKey>
                     </v12:DealerIdentifier>
                  </v12:DealerRef>
               </v11:Dealer>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v11:OrderNumber>{{orderNumberID}}</v11:OrderNumber>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v11:AcceptanceDate>2019-04-22</v11:AcceptanceDate>
            </v3:WorkshopOrderIdentifier>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <v3:OrderStatus listID="A" listVersionID="2" name="abc" languageID="DEU">open</v3:OrderStatus>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <v3:OrderCompletedDate>2019-04-22</v3:OrderCompletedDate>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <v3:ProcessingStatus listID="A" listVersionID="2" name="abc" languageID="DEU">OrderPreparation</v3:ProcessingStatus>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <v3:LastModified>2022-06-10T11:05:21Z</v3:LastModified>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <v3:ServiceAdvisor>
               <v12:EmployeeRef>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                 <!--> <v12:PartnerUID schemeID="1" schemeVersionID="1">030B4A82-1B7C-11CF-9D53-00AA003C9CB6</v12:PartnerUID>-->
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v12:ApplicationIdentifiers>
                     <!--1 or more repetitions:-->
                     <v12:ID schemeID="1" schemeVersionID="1">abcd1235</v12:ID>
                  </v12:ApplicationIdentifiers>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v12:DealerIdentifier>
                     <!--Optional:-->
                     <v12:PartnerKey>
                        <!--Optional:-->
                        <v12:Country listID="A" listVersionID="2" name="abc" languageID="DEU">DEU</v12:Country>
                        <!--Optional:-->
                        <v12:Brand listID="A" listVersionID="2" name="abc" languageID="DEU">V</v12:Brand>
                        <!--Optional:-->
                        <v12:PartnerNumber>12345</v12:PartnerNumber>
                     </v12:PartnerKey>
                  </v12:DealerIdentifier>
               </v12:EmployeeRef>
              <!--Optional:-->
               <v3:Name>Max Schmidt</v3:Name>
            </v3:ServiceAdvisor>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <v3:Customer>
               <v12:CustomerRef>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v12:PartnerUID schemeID="1" schemeVersionID="1">030B4A82-1B7C-11CF-9D53-00AA003C9CB6</v12:PartnerUID>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v12:ApplicationIdentifiers>
                     <!--1 or more repetitions:-->
                     <v12:ID schemeID="1" schemeVersionID="1">abcd1235</v12:ID>
                  </v12:ApplicationIdentifiers>
              
               </v12:CustomerRef>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v3:FirstName>Thomas</v3:FirstName>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v3:Name>Smith</v3:Name>
            </v3:Customer>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <v3:CustomerStatement languageID="DEU">something rattles when driving</v3:CustomerStatement>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <v3:CustomerDataProtectionStatement listID="A" listVersionID="2" name="abc" languageID="DEU">Yes</v3:CustomerDataProtectionStatement>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <v3:VehicleData>
               <v13:VehicleRef>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v13:VIN schemeID="1" schemeVersionID="1">{{genVIN}}</v13:VIN>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v13:LicensePlate>
                     <!--Optional:-->
                     <v13:LicensePlateNumber schemeID="1" schemeVersionID="1">B-MD2233</v13:LicensePlateNumber>
                     <!--Optional:-->
                     <v13:CountryOfLicense listID="A" listVersionID="2" name="abc" languageID="DEU">DEU</v13:CountryOfLicense>
                  </v13:LicensePlate>
               </v13:VehicleRef>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v3:VehicleAcceptanceDate>2019-04-22</v3:VehicleAcceptanceDate>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v3:RepairStartDate>2019-04-23</v3:RepairStartDate>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v3:RepairEndDate>2019-04-24</v3:RepairEndDate>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v3:OdometerValue unit="km">2345</v3:OdometerValue>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v3:Date>2019-04-24</v3:Date>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v3:OdometerReturnValue unit="km">123</v3:OdometerReturnValue>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v3:VehicleReturnDate>2019-04-24</v3:VehicleReturnDate>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v3:GeneralInspection>2007-10</v3:GeneralInspection>
               <!--Optional:-->
               <v3:ExhaustTest>2007-10</v3:ExhaustTest>
            </v3:VehicleData>
            <!--Optional:-->
            <v3:OrderItems>
               <!--1 or more repetitions:-->
               <v3:OrderItem>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v3:ItemID schemeID="1" schemeVersionID="1">6c33acbd-3a6f-4065-a5c3-37d23eaa748f</v3:ItemID>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v3:LineNumber>0</v3:LineNumber>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v3:Descriptions>
                     <!--1 or more repetitions:-->
                     <v3:Description languageID="de-AT">Coupling exchange</v3:Description>
                  </v3:Descriptions>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v3:BillToParty listID="A" listVersionID="2" name="abc" languageID="DEU">Customer</v3:BillToParty>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v3:Code>apnf:elp:1203125/1:6203700d2a363528f4d182a1</v3:Code>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v3:Status listID="A" listVersionID="2" name="abc" languageID="DEU">inWork</v3:Status>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v3:WarrantyInvoiceNumber schemeID="1" schemeVersionID="1">123456789</v3:WarrantyInvoiceNumber>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  <v3:Labours>
                     <!--1 or more repetitions:-->
                     <v3:Labour>
                        <v3:LabourOperationID schemeID="1" schemeVersionID="1">abcd12344567gftgtz</v3:LabourOperationID>
                        <v3:LabourOperationNumber schemeID="1" schemeVersionID="1">abcd1234</v3:LabourOperationNumber>
                        <!--Optional:-->
                        <v3:LineNumber>10701017</v3:LineNumber>
                        <!--Optional:-->
                        <v3:LabourOperationType listID="A" listVersionID="2" name="abc" languageID="DEU">TemporaryDefined</v3:LabourOperationType>
                       <!--Optional:-->
                        <v3:Descriptions>
                           <!--1 or more repetitions:-->
                           <v3:Description languageID="de-AT">Coupling exchange</v3:Description>
                        </v3:Descriptions>
                        <!--Optional:-->
                        <v3:CostRate>7</v3:CostRate>
                        <!--Optional:-->
                        <v3:WorkshopCode schemeID="1" schemeVersionID="1">abchsfgagh15267</v3:WorkshopCode>
                        <!--Optional:-->
                        <v3:TimeValues>
                           <!--1 or more repetitions:-->
                           <v3:TimeValue>
                              <v3:TimeUnit>500</v3:TimeUnit>
                              <!--Optional:-->
                              <v3:DegreeOfComplexity listID="A" listVersionID="2" name="abc" languageID="DEU">2</v3:DegreeOfComplexity>
                              <!--Optional:-->
                              <v3:TechnicianID schemeID="1" schemeVersionID="1">324322</v3:TechnicianID>
                           </v3:TimeValue>
                        </v3:TimeValues>
                        <!--Optional:-->
                        <v3:RelatedPackage schemeID="1" schemeVersionID="1">54db2251-48c6-4054-8041-d59e53d9f177</v3:RelatedPackage>
                     </v3:Labour>
                  </v3:Labours>
                  <!--Optional:-->
                  
               </v3:OrderItem>
            </v3:OrderItems>
         </v3:WorkshopOrder>
      </v1:AssignWorkshopOrder>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

exec: // Set variable for data container to null
// Verifies that response body isn't empty
try { RBJ = pm.response.json(); } catch(e) { console.log("Response not available"); }
// Output of response body to log
pm.test("Created WO is available - Status code 200", function () {
pm.test("Test fail, status code is: " +pm.response.code, function () {

header.description: Mandatory:The partner key, which identifies the partner
Mandatory: A token, that authorizes the requesting service with GRP

query.description: Identifier that is set by the DMS
Email address of the responsible employee
Start date after which workshop orders would be filtered
End date before which workshop orders would be filtered
The requested number of WorkshopOrder that get retrieved from the database and the possible amount of responses.

Spring Pageable parameter. Sort order of entities retrieved from database. Must use fields of WorkshopOrder to sort. If no Sort is given, the default is 'workshopOrderDocument.orMaOrderCreationDate,desc'. Fields must begin with 'workshopOrderDocument.' prefix. If you want to sort by multiple fields, add another sort query parameter to the url: sort=aField,asc&sort=bField,desc. If a sort is given that does not use a valid field a 400 is returned.
Filter by allowed values: [ PENDING, COMPLETED, DMS,  RESTORED, FAILED, OUTDATED ]. Not allowed DECLINED, DECLINED_BY_DMS.

request.description:
Requests a list of all workshop orders with the latest version of each order

This endpoint provides an array of all existing workshop orders that can be assigned to the transferred X-ASWP context and will be returned as a JSON String.

The orders can be filtered using query parameters which are optional and the Status should not be DECLINED
